Package org.beansinc.bobsled_jousting

Interface TeamBehaviour

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerTeam
public interface TeamBehaviour
A redundant interface, which could be used in the future to develop persistent computer teams.

      Gets the new random contestant.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty of the game
      currentWeek - the current week
      Returns:
      Contestant the new random contestant
      Throws:
      BSExceptions.InvalidObjectAttributeType
      BSExceptions.InvalidTeamSize

    • randomContestantQuit

      Contestant randomContestantQuit(float difficulty) throws BSExceptions.ContestantNotFound, BSExceptions.InvalidTeamSize, BSExceptions.InvalidObjectAttributeType
      Checks if a random contestant quit. If they quit they get removed from the team.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty
      Returns:
      Contestant If the a contestant quit, then that contestant would be returned. Otherwise, a new contestant with the name "null" will be returned.
      Throws:
      BSExceptions.ContestantNotFound - the contestant not found
      BSExceptions.InvalidTeamSize - the invalid team size
      BSExceptions.InvalidObjectAttributeType - the invalid object attribute type

    • randomContestantStatIncrease

      ArrayList<Contestant[]> randomContestantStatIncrease(float difficulty)
      Randomly increases the stats of selected contestants.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Contestant[]> An ArrayList of {Upgraded Contestant, Old contestant} pairs. Not upgraded contestants are not included.

    • sellContestant

      void sellContestant(Contestant contestant)
      Sells a contestant.
      Parameters:
      contestant - the contestant to be sold

    • trainContestant

      Contestant trainContestant(Contestant contestant)
      Trains a contestant.
      Parameters:
      contestant - the contestant to be trained
      Returns:
      Contestant - the newly trained contestant
